taskDescription:
Which of the following alkyl halides would you expect to undergo Friedel–Crafts reaction with rearrangement and which without? Explain.

(a) CH3CH2Cl (b) CH3CH2CH(Cl)CH3 (c) CH3CH2CH2Cl (d) (CH3)3CCH2Cl
(e) Chlorocyclohexane
